page.title: 15ATTITUDES
page.content: There is general concern over the political scene in our modern world several people having expressed fears over the Russian influences on the whole of the western world Generally people have a very optimistic outlook for the future and feel that we have a lot to be thankful for in this part of the country The age of the micro-chip is viewed with a certain amount of caution although it is generally accepted that used properly it can be of great benefit to society as a whole The family unit is seen as a most important part for the stability of the county, country and the world and greater emphasis should be put on this when using modern technology
